news.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says China's escalation was 'big mistake,' country playing with 'losing hand'
news.summary: Japan has been at the forefront of countries eager to negotiate, and the White House expects a multitude of others. The U.S. and Japan have a long history of working together on issues such as trade.

news.title: Walgreens tops estimates as drugstore chain cuts costs, prepares to go private
news.summary: The company is in the process of being taken private by Sycamore Partners. The deal is expected to close in the fourth quarter of this year.

news.title: Oil prices steady after booking steep losses on fears of full-blown trade war
news.summary: U.S. crude oil is down about 14% and Brent has fallen around 13% since Trump announced his tariffs last Wednesday. U.S.-bound crude oil has fallen about 14%. Brent has dropped around 13%.

news.title: Cambodia hit with highest Trump tariff, but manufacturing 'absolutely not' coming back to U.S., trade group says
news.summary: Retailers rely on Cambodian factories, which were just hit with a 49% tariff rate by Trump. A trade group says that manufacturing will not return to the U.S.

news.title: Fake job seekers are flooding U.S. companies that are hiring for remote positions, tech CEOs say
news.summary: Companies have long faced external attacks from hackers. Now, thanks to generative AI, another threat has emerged: Employees who aren't who they say they are.
